data.message: Dear Facebook, there are links on my timeline that I did not authorize to be  published. Please do something about it.

replies.message: Hi Caterina. You can control whether an app can publish stories to your Timeline by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2si1mtb. We can also take you through a few steps to make sure any recent changes to your account were made by you as well as help you change your password and secure your account. To get started, visit: http://bit.ly/2ssaESR. Hope that helps! -William
Stop clicking clicking clicking and read your permissions. This is where AUTHORIZE PERMISSIONS...
thanks, but If I click on a link (no matter which applications is linked with) I would like to be informed instantly if a post on a random subject that i did not choose will appear on my timeline.
Caterina Valitutti or you should read the fine print. Lol
